MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-JAN-2021 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are working on site to repair an underground cable fault and in order to safely carry out a permanent repair, we now need isolate further supplies at 11:20am. This may affect the supply to your property and we will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:57am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
